  • Method Details

    • viewAllQuests

      @GetMapping("/quests") public String viewAllQuests(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Gets the HTML page for the /quests request. Shows all quests in a table.
      Parameters:
      model - contains the list of all quests from the database, DTO format
      Returns:
      the html page "quests"

    • viewQuest

      @GetMapping("/quests/{id}") public String viewQuest(@PathVariable Long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Gets the HTML page for the /quests/{id} request with variable id, representing a quest's id.
      Parameters:
      id - represents the quest's id that will be viewed
      model - contains the questDTO with the above id
      Returns:
      the html page "quest-details"

    • viewMyQuests

      @GetMapping("/quests/my-quests") public String viewMyQuests(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Gets the HTML page for the /quests/my-quests request. Shows all of the currently authenticated user's quests.
      Parameters:
      model - contains the list of quests that the currently authenticated user has active
      Returns:
      the html page "my-quests"

    • addQuest

      @GetMapping("/quests/add-quest") public String addQuest(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Gets the HTML page for the /quests/add-quest request. Allows for adding a new Quest.
      Parameters:
      model - contains an empty QuestDTO
      Returns:
      the html page "add-quest"

    • saveQuest

      @PostMapping("/quests/save-quest") public String saveQuest(@Valid @ModelAttribute("quest") @Valid QuestDTO questDTO, org.springframework.validation.BindingResult bindingResult, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Gets the HTML page for the /quests/save-quest PostRequest. Saves the questDTO to the database.
      Parameters:
      questDTO - the quest to be saved
      bindingResult - checker in case the binding fails
      model - contains the questDTO
      Returns:
      redirects to /quests in case of success, returns html "add-quest" in case of failure

    • removeQuest

      @GetMapping("/quests/remove-quest/{id}") public String removeQuest(@PathVariable Long id, org.springframework.ui.Model model)
      Gets the HTML page for the /quests/remove-quest/{id} request with variable id. Allows for removing a certain quest.
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the quest to be removed
      model - contains the new and updated list of quests
      Returns:
      redirects back to the /quests/my-quests request
